mapper.select: SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, FAC_SEQ_NO AS facSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS facGubunCode, FAC_CODE AS facCode, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE AS hireFacEnable, INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN AS installArticleGubun, ASSET_SEQ_NO AS assetSeqNo, FAC_IP_ADDR AS facIpAddr, FAC_GW_ADDR AS facGwAddr, FAC_SMASK_ADDR AS facSmaskAddr, HIRE_FEE AS hireFee, DETAIL_FAC_INFO AS detailFacInfo FROM ATMS_02001160

SELECT WORK_SEQ_NO AS workSeqNo, FAC_SEQ_NO AS facSeqNo, CHANGE_CHASU AS changeChasu, STEXT_GUBUN AS stextGubun, JISA_CODE AS jisaCode, BRANCH_CODE AS branchCode, CORNER_CODE AS cornerCode, FAC_GUBUN_CODE AS facGubunCode, FAC_CODE AS facCode, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE AS hireFacEnable, INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN AS installArticleGubun, ASSET_SEQ_NO AS assetSeqNo, FAC_IP_ADDR AS facIpAddr, FAC_GW_ADDR AS facGwAddr, FAC_SMASK_ADDR AS facSmaskAddr, HIRE_FEE AS hireFee, DETAIL_FAC_INFO AS detailFacInfo FROM ATMS_02001160 WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE ATMS_02001160 SET FAC_SEQ_NO = #{facSeqNo}, CHANGE_CHASU = #{changeChasu}, STEXT_GUBUN = #{stextGubun}, JISA_CODE = #{jisaCode}, BRANCH_CODE = #{branchCode}, CORNER_CODE = #{cornerCode}, FAC_GUBUN_CODE = #{facGubunCode}, FAC_CODE = #{facCode}, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE = #{hireFacEnable}, INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN = #{installArticleGubun}, ASSET_SEQ_NO = #{assetSeqNo}, FAC_IP_ADDR = #{facIpAddr}, FAC_GW_ADDR = #{facGwAddr}, FAC_SMASK_ADDR = #{facSmaskAddr}, HIRE_FEE = #{hireFee}, DETAIL_FAC_INFO = #{detailFacInfo} WHERE WORK_SEQ_NO = #{workSeqNo}

INSERT INTO ATMS_02001160 ( WORK_SEQ_NO, FAC_SEQ_NO, CHANGE_CHASU, STEXT_GUBUN, JISA_CODE, BRANCH_CODE, CORNER_CODE, FAC_GUBUN_CODE, FAC_CODE, HIRE_FAC_ENABLE, INSTALL_ARTICLE_GUBUN, ASSET_SEQ_NO, FAC_IP_ADDR, FAC_GW_ADDR, FAC_SMASK_ADDR, HIRE_FEE, DETAIL_FAC_INFO ) VALUES ( #{workSeqNo}, #{facSeqNo}, #{changeChasu}, #{stextGubun}, #{jisaCode}, #{branchCode}, #{cornerCode}, #{facGubunCode}, #{facCode}, #{hireFacEnable}, #{installArticleGubun}, #{assetSeqNo}, #{facIpAddr}, #{facGwAddr}, #{facSmaskAddr}, #{hireFee}, #{detailFacInfo} )
